#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <cstdio>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <limits.h>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;

#define PII pair<int ,int>
#define m_p make_pair
#define LL long long
#define MAX 100005

string a;

bool cmp(string x , string y)
{
    return ((x+y)<(y+x));
}

int main()
{
    int test,n;

    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);

    cin>>test;
    while(test--){
        cin>>n;

        vector < string > arr(n);

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>arr[i];
        sort(arr.rbegin() , arr.rend(),cmp);

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cout<<arr[i];
        cout<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
